archimate:TechnologyProcess.name: Identify New FIles and Make Save Set (Technology Process)
archimate:TechnologyProcess.documentation:
Add New Fiels to the Disaster Recovery store.
Scan all files under the root directory, identifying files not previously backed up to the disatser recovery store. Bundle files into size convenient for tape recovery. Send file bundles to tape. The files are identified by modification time later than the previous incremental. FIle deletions are identified through GPFS logs.
